com.sri.ai.praise.lang.translate

Interface Translator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHOGMv1_to_Target_Translator, AbstractTranslator, AbstractUAI_to_HOGMv1_Translator, AbstractUAI_to_Target_Translator, HOGMv1_to_UAI_Translator, UAI_to_HOGMv1_Using_Equalities_Translator, UAI_to_HOGMv1_Using_Inequalities_Translator, UAI_to_HuginDotNet_Translator

    @Beta
public interface Translator
    Interface to be implemented by all Language Translators.
    Author:
    oreilly

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.lang.String[] getInputFileExtensions()
      Used if the translator's inputs are to be read from a file.
      default java.lang.String getInputModelFileNameWithNoExtension(java.io.File sourceModelFile)
      Utility routine that based on the file name convention for models will return an extension neutral model name for a source model file.
      default int getNumberOfInputs()
      Get the number of inputs required by the translator (usually just 1).
      default int getNumberOfOutputs()
      Get the number of outputs generated by the translator.
      default java.lang.String[] getOutputFileExtensions()
      Used if the translator's outputs are to be written to a file.
      ModelLanguage getSource() 
      default java.nio.charset.Charset getSourceCharset() 
      ModelLanguage getTarget() 
      default java.nio.charset.Charset getTargetCharset() 
      void translate(java.lang.String inputIdentifier, java.io.Reader[] inputModelReaders, java.io.PrintWriter[] translatedOutputs, TranslatorOptions options)
      Perform the translation from an input model to an output model.

    • Method Detail

      • getSource

        ModelLanguage getSource()
        Returns:
        the source model language for the translator.

      • getSourceCharset

        default java.nio.charset.Charset getSourceCharset()
        Returns:
        the source model's charset.

      • getTarget

        ModelLanguage getTarget()
        Returns:
        the target model language for the translator.

      • getTargetCharset

        default java.nio.charset.Charset getTargetCharset()
        Returns:
        the target model's charset.

      • getNumberOfInputs

        default int getNumberOfInputs()
        Get the number of inputs required by the translator (usually just 1).
        Returns:
        the number of inputs required to perform the translation (e.g. a UAI input to target translation may comprise of translating the model file '.uai' and its evidence file '.uai.evid').

      • getInputFileExtensions

        default java.lang.String[] getInputFileExtensions()
        Used if the translator's inputs are to be read from a file. NOTE: the first input file extension is to always be the main model file, others are considered supporting.
        Returns:
        the unique file extensions to use for each input (# file extensions must = number of inputs).

      • getNumberOfOutputs

        default int getNumberOfOutputs()
        Get the number of outputs generated by the translator.
        Returns:
        the number of outputs generated by the translation (e.g. UAI generates two outputs, one for the model and the other for the default evidence).

      • getOutputFileExtensions

        default java.lang.String[] getOutputFileExtensions()
        Used if the translator's outputs are to be written to a file. NOTE: the first output file extension is to always be the main model file, others are considered supporting.
        Returns:
        the unique file extensions to use for each output (# file extensions must = number of outputs).

      • translate

        void translate(java.lang.String inputIdentifier,
               java.io.Reader[] inputModelReaders,
               java.io.PrintWriter[] translatedOutputs,
               TranslatorOptions options)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Perform the translation from an input model to an output model.
        Parameters:
        inputIdentifier - an identifying name for the input.
        inputModelReaders - the readers for the input model definitions.
        translatedOutputs - the outputs to be used for the translated model.
        options - options to be passed to the translator.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exceptions handling to be performed outside of the translator.

      • getInputModelFileNameWithNoExtension

        default java.lang.String getInputModelFileNameWithNoExtension(java.io.File sourceModelFile)
        Utility routine that based on the file name convention for models will return an extension neutral model name for a source model file.
        Parameters:
        sourceModelFile - The input model file whose extension neutral name is to be returned.
        Returns:
        the extension neutral name of the input model file.
